<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/158793</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>158793</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3251</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Barry's Song Collection</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Lied-Ansammlung Barrys</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Collection de la Chanson de Barry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Coleção Da Canção De Barry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Accumulazione Di Canzone Del Barry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συλλογή τραγουδιού του Barry</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Colección De la Canción De Barry</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This website has a links to a collection of songs which can be used in a variety of English learning activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">music</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">songs</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Diese Web site hat Links zu einer Ansammlung 
Lieden, die in einer Vielzahl der englischen Lernenaktivitäten 
verwendet werden können.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Ce site Web a des liens à une collection de 
chansons qui peuvent être utilisées dans une variété d'étude 
anglaise.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este Web site tem as ligações a uma coleção 
das canções que podem ser usadas em uma variedade de atividades de 
aprendizagem inglesas.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo Web site ha collegamenti ad una collezione 
di canzoni che possono essere usate in una varietà di attività 
imparanti inglesi.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτός ο ιστοχώρος έχει τις συνδέσεις με μια συλλογή 
των τραγουδιών που μπορεί να χρησιμοποιηθεί σε ποικίλες αγγλικές 
δραστηριότητες εκμάθησης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este Web site tiene conexiones a una colección de
las canciones que se pueden utilizar en una variedad de actividades 
que aprenden inglesas.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Musik</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Liede</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">musique</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">chansons</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">canções</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">musica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">canzoni</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μουσική</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τραγούδια</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Inglés</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">música</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">canciones</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
